entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
